DOC.brief_summary: This study aim identify genetic , medical , dietary environmental factor associate development endometrioma and/or deep infiltrating endometriosis order move towards early diagnosis implementation potential preventative measure .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Potential Risk Factors Linked Development Severe Forms Endometriosis
DOC.criteria: The subject female age 18 41 year The subject undergone laparoscopy laparotomy benign gynecological indication exclude pregnancy , last 3 month The subject 's surgery show either visible endometriosis lesion histologically confirm endometriosis lesion : superficial endometriosis , endometrioma deep infiltrating endometriosis The subject give write informed consent prior studyrelated procedure The subject pregnant The subject 's surgery result show evidence malignancy The subject mental condition render unable understand nature , scope possible consequence study , and/or evidence uncooperative attitude
